; docformat = 'rst' ;+ ; Open a file using the default system application. ; ; Works on Macs only! ; ; :Params: ; file : in, required, type=string ; Path to the file to be opened. ;- PRO ajs_open_file, file compile_opt idl2 on_error, 2 IF !version.os_name EQ 'Mac OS X' THEN BEGIN spawn, 'open ' + file ENDIF ELSE BEGIN message, 'Don''t know how to launch file: ' + file ENDELSE END
